GENEFUNK2090.title: GeneFunk2090 Game System
GENEFUNK2090.AbilityUseHint: Configure how you would like to use the {name} {type}.
GENEFUNK2090.AbilityUseUnavailableHint: There are no uses of this item remaining!
GENEFUNK2090.AbilityUseChargedHint: This {type} is charged and ready to use!
GENEFUNK2090.AbilityUseRechargeHint: This {type} is depleted and must be recharged!
GENEFUNK2090.AbilityUseNormalHint: This {type} has {value} of {max} uses per {per} remaining.
GENEFUNK2090.AbilityUseConsumableChargeH: Using this {type} will consume 1 charge of {value} remaining.
GENEFUNK2090.AbilityUseConsumableQuantit: Using this {type} will consume 1 quantity of {quantity} remaining
GENEFUNK2090.AbilityUseConsumableDestroy: Using this {type} will consume its final charge and it will be destroyed.
Using this {type} will consume the final charge off {name} and destroy it.
GENEFUNK2090.AbilityConfigure: Configure Ability Checks and Saving Throws
GENEFUNK2090.AbilityConfigurationHint: Configure ability saving throw proficiency, saving throw bonuses, and check bonuses.
GENEFUNK2090.AbilityCheckGlobalBonusHint: This bonus applies to all ability checks made by this actor.
GENEFUNK2090.ActionWarningNoItem: The requested item {item} no longer exists on Actor {name}
GENEFUNK2090.ActionWarningNoToken: You must have one or more controlled Tokens in order to use this option.
GENEFUNK2090.ActorWarningInvalidItem: {itemType} items cannot be added to a {actorType}.
GENEFUNK2090.ActorWarningSingleton: Only a single {itemType} can be added to a {actorType}.
GENEFUNK2090.ActiveEffectOverrideWarning: This value is being modified by an Active Effect and cannot be edited. Disable the effect to edit it.
GENEFUNK2090.AddEmbeddedItemPromptHint: Do you want to add these items to your character sheet?
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementAbilityScoreImpr: Allow the player to increase one or more ability scores or take an optional feat.
Maximum number of points a player can assign to a single score.
Drop a feat here to choose one instead of an ability score improvement.
Only features with the 'feat' type can be selected.
Scores cannot be modified with a feat selected.
Number of points that can be assigned to any ability score that doesn't have a fixed improvement set.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementConfigureAllowDr: Should players be able to drop their own choices into this advancement?
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementConfigureDropAre: Drop Items here to add them to the pool from which a player can choose.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementDeleteConfirmati: Deleting this item will also delete all advancement choices made for it. These changes will be removed from your character as long as the checkbox below is checked.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementFlowDropAreaHint: Drop an Item here to choose it.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementHitPointsHint: Track the player's hit points for each level in the class.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementHitPointsEmptyEr: Hit points must be rolled or the average value must be taken.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementHitPointsInvalid: Hit points must be a valid whole number.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemChoiceHint: Present the player with a choice of items (such as equipment, features, or spells) that they can choose for their character at one or more levels.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemChoiceLevels: Specify how many choices are allowed at each level.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemChoicePrevio: This item has already been chosen at a previous level.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemChoiceSpellL: Only {level} or lower spells can be chosen for this advancement.
Only {level} spells can be chosen for this advancement.
Only allow choices from spells of this level.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemChoiceTypeHi: Restrict what Item types can be choosen.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemChoiceTypeWa: Only {type} items can be selected for this choice.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemGrantHint: Grant the character items (such as equipment, features, or spells) when they reach a certain level.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemGrantDropHin: Drop Items here to add them to the list granted by this advancement.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemGrantDuplica: That item already exists on this advancement.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemGrantRecursi: You cannot grant an item in its own advancement.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemGrantOptiona: If optional, players will be given the option to opt out of any of the following items, otherwise all of them are granted.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementItemTypeInvalidW: {type} items cannot be added with this advancement type.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementLevelDownConfirm: Leveling this class down will also undo all advancement choices made for it. These changes will be removed from your character as long as the checkbox below is checked.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementManagerCloseMess: If the advancement process is cancelled, choices made so far will be discarded and no changes will be made to the actor.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementManagerRestartCo: Are you sure you wish to undo all choices so far?
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementMigrationHint: Select which of the following advancements will be added to {name}.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementScaleValueHint: A single value that changes as a class increases in level that is made available in roll formulas (such as a Monk's martial arts die).
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementScaleValueIdenti: This scale value for the current level will be available using @scale.{class}.{identifier} in a formula.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementScaleValueTypeHi: Use this for representing creature challenge ratings for features like Wild Shape.
Use this for dice values like bardic inspiration, sneak attack, or superiority dice.
Use this for numerical values that represent a distance, such as unarmored movement speed, or aura of protection radius.
Use this for purely numerical values like rage damage bonus or number of uses per day.
Use this if you are unsure of the type of the scale values, or if the type does not matter.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementTraitHint: Grant a character certain traits or give them an option to select traits (such as proficiencies, skills, languages).
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementTraitAllowReplac: If a trait is already set on the actor, allow the player to choose from any other trait as a replacement.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementTraitChoicesHint: The following traits will be presented as a choice to the player.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementTraitGrantsHint: The following traits will be granted to the character as long as they don't already possess that trait.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementTraitModeExperti: Gain expertise in a trait in which you already have proficiency.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementTraitModeForceHi: Gain expertise in a trait regardless of your previous proficiency level.
GENEFUNK2090.AdvancementTraitModeUpgrade: Gain proficiency in a trait unless you already have it, otherwise gain expertise.
GENEFUNK2090.ArmorConfigHint: Fill in the above box to override automatically calculated armor class.
GENEFUNK2090.BonusesHint: Define global bonuses as formulas which are added to certain rolls. For example: 1d4 + 2
GENEFUNK2090.BonusesInstructions: Configure character bonuses which are added to the appropriate dice roll
GENEFUNK2090.ClassIdentifierHint: This class's data will be accessible using @classes.{identifier} in roll formulas.
GENEFUNK2090.ClassMakeOriginalHint: First class taken by character used to determine certain class traits when multiclassing.
GENEFUNK2090.ConsumeWarningNoResource: {name} is designated to consume {type} but no resource is specified!
GENEFUNK2090.ConsumeWarningNoSource: The designated {type} source that {name} consumes no longer exists!
GENEFUNK2090.ConsumeWarningNoQuantity: {name} has run out of its designated {type}!
GENEFUNK2090.ConsumeWarningZeroAttribute: {name} has run out of its designated attribute resource pool!
GENEFUNK2090.ConsumeScalingTooltip: If checked, consuming additional resources will increase the level the spell is cast at.
GENEFUNK2090.ConsumableLastChargeWarn: This is the last charge of this unit and consuming it will also reduce the item's quantity by 1
GENEFUNK2090.CurrencyConvertHint: Convert all carried currency to the highest possible denomination to reduce the amount of coinage carried by the character. Be wary, this action cannot be undone.
GENEFUNK2090.DamagePhysicalBypassHint: These weapon properties will bypass damage resistance for physical damage.
GENEFUNK2090.DeathSaveCriticalSuccess: {name} critically succeeded on a death saving throw and has regained 1 Hit Point!
GENEFUNK2090.DeathSaveSuccess: {name} has survived with 3 death save successes and is now stable!
GENEFUNK2090.DeathSaveFailure: {name} has died with 3 death save failures!
GENEFUNK2090.DeathSaveUnnecessary: You do not need to roll death saves because you have a positive number of hit points or have already reached 3 successes or failures.
GENEFUNK2090.EffectUnavailableInfo: Source item must be equipped or attuned to activate these
GENEFUNK2090.FilterNoSpells: No spells found for this set of filters.
GENEFUNK2090.NoSpellLevels: This character has no spellcaster levels, but you may add spells manually.
GENEFUNK2090.FlagsInstructions: Configure character features and traits which fine-tune behaviors of the GeneFunk2090 system.
GENEFUNK2090.FlagsDiamondSoulHint: Gain proficiency to all saving throws.
GENEFUNK2090.FlagsElvenAccuracyHint: Roll an extra d20 with advantage to Dex, Int, Wis, or Cha.
GENEFUNK2090.FlagsHalflingLuckyHint: Reroll ones when rolling d20 checks.
GENEFUNK2090.FlagsInitiativeAdvHint: Provided by feats or magical items.
GENEFUNK2090.FlagsJOATHint: Half-Proficiency to Ability Checks in which you are not already Proficient.
GENEFUNK2090.FlagsObservantHint: Provides a +5 to passive Perception and Investigation.
GENEFUNK2090.FlagsRemarkableAthleteHint: Half-Proficiency (rounded-up) to physical Ability Checks and Initiative.
GENEFUNK2090.FlagsWeaponCritThresholdHin: An expanded critical hit threshold for weapon attacks.
GENEFUNK2090.FlagsSpellCritThresholdHint: An expanded critical hit threshold for spell attacks.
GENEFUNK2090.FlagsMeleeCriticalDiceHint: A number of additional damage dice added to melee weapon critical hits.
GENEFUNK2090.FormulaMissingReferenceWarn: The {property} formula within {name} has references to missing data: {references}
GENEFUNK2090.HPFormulaError: The provided hit point formula could not be evaluated.
GENEFUNK2090.HitDiceConfigHint: Adjust remaining hit dice levels for each class.
GENEFUNK2090.HitDiceWarn: {name} has no available {formula} Hit Dice remaining!
GENEFUNK2090.IdentifierError: Identifier can only contain letters (a-z), numbers (0-9), dashes (-), and underscores (_).
GENEFUNK2090.InitiativeConfigHint: Configure initiative modifiers and bonuses which apply to this Actor.
GENEFUNK2090.ItemDestroyEmptyTooltip: If this item has limited uses, it will be destroyed when none are left.
GENEFUNK2090.ItemRecoveryFormulaWarning: Unable to recover charges for {name}. Invalid recovery formula '{formula}'.
GENEFUNK2090.LimitedUsesPromptTooltip: If unchecked, the prompt to consume an available use will be suppressed.
GENEFUNK2090.LongRestHint: Take a long rest? On a long rest you will recover hit points, half your maximum hit dice, class resources, limited use item charges, and spell slots.
GENEFUNK2090.LongRestResult: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points and {dice} Hit Dice.
GENEFUNK2090.LongRestResultHitDice: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {dice} Hit Dice.
GENEFUNK2090.LongRestResultHitPoints: {name} takes a long rest and recovers {health} Hit Points.
GENEFUNK2090.MaxCharacterLevelExceededWa: Character cannot be advanced past level {max}.
GENEFUNK2090.MaxClassLevelExceededWarn: Class cannot be advanced past level {max}.
GENEFUNK2090.MaxClassLevelMinimumWarn: Class must have at least one level.
GENEFUNK2090.ModuleArtConfigH: Configure which module-provided art should be used.
GENEFUNK2090.Name: Character Name
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepAE: Keep all effects (overrides other effect retention options).
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepBackgroundAE: Keep effects that originate from your background?
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepClass: Keep proficiency bonus (leaves class items in sheet)
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepClassAE: Keep effects that originate from your class or subclass?
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepEquipmentAE: Keep effects that originate from your equipment?
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepFeatureAE: Keep effects that originate from your features?
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepMental: Keep mental ability scores (Int, Wis, Cha)
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepOriginAE: Keep effects that originate from this actor (i.e. effects not attached to features, items, spells)
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepOtherOriginAE: Keep effects that originate from a different actor?
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepPhysical: Keep physical ability scores (Str, Dex, Con)
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepSelf: Keep self (just change image and size i.e. for spells like Disguise Self)
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphKeepSpellAE: Keep effects that originate from your spells?
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphMergeSaves: Merge saving throw proficiencies (take the highest)
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphRevertNoOriginalAc: No original actor was found with reference '{reference}'
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphRevertWarn: You do not have permission to revert this Actor's polymorphed state.
GENEFUNK2090.PolymorphWarn: You are not allowed to polymorph this actor!
GENEFUNK2090.MovementConfigHint: Configure movement speed and special movement attributes.
GENEFUNK2090.NewDayHint: Recover limited use abilities which recharge "per day"?
GENEFUNK2090.SaveGlobalBonusHint: This bonus applies to all saving throws made by this actor.
GENEFUNK2090.SensesConfigHint: Configure any special sensory perception abilities that this actor possesses.
GENEFUNK2090.ShortRestHint: Take a short rest? On a short rest you may spend remaining Hit Dice and recover primary or secondary resources.
GENEFUNK2090.ShortRestResult: {name} takes a short rest spending {dice} Hit Dice to recover {health} Hit Points.
GENEFUNK2090.SkillGlobalBonusCheckHint: This bonus applies to all skill checks made by this actor.
GENEFUNK2090.SpellCastNoSlots: You have no available {level} spell slots with which to cast {name}
GENEFUNK2090.SpellCastNoSlotsLeft: You have no available spell slots with which to cast {name}!
GENEFUNK2090.SubclassIdentifierHint: This identifier should match the identifier on the parent class to ensure they are properly linked.
GENEFUNK2090.SubclassAssignmentError: {class} already has a subclass. Remove the existing '{subclass}' subclass before adding a new one.
GENEFUNK2090.SubclassDuplicateError: A subclass with the identifier {identifier} already exists on this actor.
GENEFUNK2090.SubclassMismatchWarn: {name} subclass has no matching class with identifier '{class}'.
GENEFUNK2090.TemplatePromptTooltip: If unchecked, the prompt for placing a Measured Template will be suppressed.
GENEFUNK2090.VehicleActionsHint: Actions taken with full crew complement
GENEFUNK2090.WarnBadACFormula: The provided AC formula could not be evaluated.
GENEFUNK2090.WarnCantAddMultipleAdvancem: It is not currently possible to add multiple items with advancements to an actor at the same time. Please add them individually.
GENEFUNK2090.WarnMultipleArmor: More than one suit of armor equipped, AC calculation may be incorrect.
GENEFUNK2090.WarnMultipleShields: More than one shield equipped, AC calculation may be incorrect.
GENEFUNK2090.description: A system for playing the fifth edition of the worlds most popular roleplaying game in the Foundry Virtual Tabletop environment.
EDITOR.GENEFUNK2090.Inline.NoActorWarnin: No selected or assigned actor could be found to execute this roll.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.GENEFUNK2090.Class.Addi: List of equipment granted by this class if taken at first level.
Additional descriptive text displayed beneath the auto-generated hit points section.
Additional descriptive text displayed beneath list of proficiencies granted by this class.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.GENEFUNK2090.Class.Desc: Primary description of the class that will appear first.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.GENEFUNK2090.Class.Feat: As a {lowercaseName}, you gain the following class features, which are summarized in the {name} table.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.GENEFUNK2090.Class.HitP: Hit Points at 1st Level: {max} + your Constitution modifier
Hit Points at Higher Levels: {dice} (or {average}) + your Constitution modifier per {class} level after 1st
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.GENEFUNK2090.Class.NoVa: No valid class selected, press the edit button to add a class.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.GENEFUNK2090.Class.Opti: The following section contains options {class} features. These features are not granted automatically, and you can choose one, some, or all of them at your DM's discretion.
JOURNALENTRYPAGE.GENEFUNK2090.Class.Subc: Introduction that will be displayed before this class's subclasses.
MACRO.5eMissingTargetWarn: Your controlled actor '{actor}' does not have an {type} with name '{name}'.
MACRO.5eMultipleTargetsWarn: Your controlled actor '{actor}' has more than one {type} with name '{name}'. The first match will be chosen.
MACRO.5eNoActorSelected: No selected or assigned actor could be found to target with macro.
MACRO.5eUnownedWarn: You can only create macro buttons for owned Items
MIGRATION.5eBegin: Applying DnD5E System Migration for version {version}. Please be patient and do not close your game or shut down your server.
MIGRATION.5eComplete: DnD5E System Migration to version {version} completed!
MIGRATION.5eVersionTooOldWarning: Your GeneFunk2090 system data is from too old a Foundry version and cannot be reliably migrated to the latest version. The process will be attempted, but errors may occur.
SETTINGS.5eAllowPolymorphingL: Allow players to polymorph their own actors.
SETTINGS.5eAutoCollapseCardL: Automatically collapse Item Card descriptions in the Chat Log
SETTINGS.5eAutoSpellTemplateL: When a spell is cast, defaults to begin the process to create the corresponding Measured Template if any (requires TRUSTED or higher player role)
SETTINGS.5eCriticalMaxDiceL: Make critical hits more deadly by maximizing the values of base damage dice.
SETTINGS.5eCriticalModifiersL: Make critical hits more deadly by multiplying non-dice modifiers in addition to rolled dice.
SETTINGS.5eCurWtL: Carried currency affects character encumbrance following the rules on PHB pg. 143.
SETTINGS.5eDiagL: Configure which diagonal movement rule should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.5eFeatsL: Allow players to choose a feat rather than taking an ability score improvement during class advancement.
SETTINGS.5eHonorL: Enable the use of the optional Honor ability score. Requires the world to be reloaded.
SETTINGS.5eInitTBL: Append the raw Dexterity ability score to break ties in Initiative.
SETTINGS.5eMetricL: Replaces all reference to lbs with kgs and updates the encumbrance calculations to use metric weight units.
SETTINGS.5eNoAdvancementsL: Do not prompt for level-up or character creation choices.
SETTINGS.5eNoExpL: Remove experience bars from character sheets.
SETTINGS.5eProfL: Configure proficiency modifier to use a fixed bonus or a dice roll. Reloading the world is required for this change to take effect.
SETTINGS.5eRestL: Configure which rest variant should be used for games within this system.
SETTINGS.5eGridAlignedSquareTemplatesL: When square templates are created as the result of casting a spell or using an item, they will be locked to the grid alignment and unable to be rotated.
SETTINGS.5eSanityL: Enable the use of the optional Sanity ability score. Requires the world to be reloaded.
